column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " These are Fire Nation traps , you can tell from the metalwork .
#Text=We better pack up camp , and get moving .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Think about it : Somehow Prince Zuko and the Fire Nation keep finding us .
#Text=It 's because they spot Appa , he 's just too noticeable .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He 's a gigantic fluffy monster with an arrow on his head !
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka 's just jealous 'cause he does n't have an arrow .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know you all wan na fly , but my instincts tell me we should play it safe this time and walk .
#Text=" Katara says : " Who made you the boss ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm not the boss , I 'm the leader .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm the oldest , and I 'm a warrior , so I 'm the leader !
#Text=" Katara says : " If anyone 's the leader , it 's Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Are you kidding , he 's just a goofy kid !
#Text=" Katara says : " Why do boys always think someone has to be the leader ?
#Text=I bet you would n't be so bossy if you kissed a girl .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 've kissed a girl , you just have n't met her .
#Text=Look , my instincts tell me we have a better chance of slipping through on foot , and a leader has to trust his instincts .
#Text=" Katara says : " Okay , we 'll try it your way , oh wise leader .
#Text=How do people go anywhere without a flying bison ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Well I do n't know , Aang .
#Text=Why do n't you ask Sokka 's instincts ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ha , ha , very funny .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm tired of carrying this pack .
#Text=" Katara says : " You know who you should ask to carry it for a while ?
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's a great idea .
#Text=Hey , Sokka 's instincts , would you mind - " Sokka says : " Okay , okay , I get it .
#Text=But the important thing is that we 're safe from the Fire ... Nation .
#Text=" Sokka says : " If you let us pass , we promise not to hurt you .
#Text=" Katara says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Eye - patch soldier says : " You promise not to hurt us ?
#Text=" Fire Nation soldier says : " They 're in the trees !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , he was mine !
#Text=" Jet says : " Got ta be quicker next time .
#Text=" Aang says : " You just took out a whole army almost single - handed .
#Text=" Jet says : " My name is Jet , and these are my Freedom Fighters , Sneers , Longshot , Smellerbee , The Duke , and Pipsqueak .
#Text=" Aang says : " Ha , ha , Pipsqueak , that 's a funny name .
#Text=" Pipsqueak says : " You think my name is funny ?
